title: Cindy Crawford Posts Throwback Photo with Princess Diana Following Cameo in “The Crown”
description: On Aug. 31, 1997, Diana and her boyfriend, Dodi Fayed, were traveling by car in Paris with a driver and bodyguard pursued by paparazzi when their vehicle slammed into a support column of a tunnel, flipped and came to a rest in front of oncoming traffic. Dodi and the driver died instantly while Diana died later in the hospital. She was 36 years old.

title: The Crown's Dominic West says he 'understands' criticism and 'discomfort' around the Netflix show - and 'thought a lot about that' before taking on the role of Charles
description: Prince of Wales on The Crown - told BBC 5 Live that he had 'thought a lot' about the discomfort around events it was portraying.

title: Former royal chef explains unusual dinner rule for William and Kate’s children
description: Former royal chef Darren McGrady, who worked for both the late Queen Elizabeth II and Princess Diana, told Harper’s Bazaar that the royal children cannot eat with their parents at official dinners or during holidays. The chef revealed that the rule stems from the importance of learning “polite conversation”, the Mirror reports.

title: The world’s best hotels for 2024 have been named – and six are in the UK
description: That’s because six UK hotels were included in Condé Nast Traveller’s 2024 ‘ Gold List ’, which names all of the most glamorous hotels across the world for holidaymakers to shortlist. There are 68 bougie resorts and hotels on the full list, divided into continents, but these are the six that are very close to home.

title: Prince Harry's book 'didn't sell anywhere near enough to warrant his huge payday'
description: Prince Harry 's tell-all book Spare reportedly didn't sell as many copies as originally hoped, with one royal commentator stating that the lack of copies sold did not "warrant his huge payday". According to royal commentator Daniela Elser, Spare "almost immediately broke records" and was set to ensure the former royal with some "success".

title: Prince Archie is like a young Prince Harry with cute bobble hat and red hair
description: In the photo, which is a little blurred, Archie wears a beige hooded top and a matching bobble hat. The youngster looks adorable with his red hair and brown eyes, with many fans comparing him to Prince Harry. One commented: “Beautiful! Is mini Harry,” and another said: “Harry's double.”

title: Meghan Markle stars as extra in Christmas advert for coffee company
description: The Duchess of Sussex has yet again jumped in to help a friend, featuring in a Christmas advert. Meghan Markle appeared in the Instagram ad for Clevr Blends, a California-based ‘wellness brand’. Wearing a casual outfit, the royal is seen pacing around with a laptop, making hot drinks and stacking boxes in their warehouse.

title: Prince Harry's struggle with Princess Diana's last moments
description: It is almost 20 years since Diana, Princess of Wales died in Paris. Prestwick Care CEO Bunty Malhotra is captured by hidden camera during a Panorama investigation. The Archbishop of Canterbury described the moment as a "glitch" in exclusive footage from an upcoming documentary.

title: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle continue 'Windsor family tradition' at Christmas with Prince Archie and Princess Lilibet
description: This tradition of the royals exchanging gifts on Christmas Eve was popularised by Queen Victoria and Prince Albert thanks to the royal family's German ancestry. It's known as Heiligabend Bescherung - which translates as Christmas Eve exchanging presents.

title: Piers Morgan’s Statement on the Prince Harry Phone Hacking Case – Annotated
description: Dr Evan Harris, former Director of Hacked Off and now a legal analyst to the successful claimants against Mirror Group Newspapers over phone hacking and other unlawful information gathering, deconstructs former Daily Mirror editor Piers Morgan’s statement on the damning judgement against the firm last week.

title: Did You Catch the Hidden Message In Prince Harry and Meghan Markle’s Holiday Card?
description: But there’s a detail of the Sussex holiday card you may have missed, a body language expert told The Daily Express. Darren Stanton believes that, while the card may look more “corporate,” that Harry and Meghan are subtly communicating their happiness to the public. (In the photo, both beam widely.)
